00031 void WorldMap::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* e)
00032 {
00033         int x=e->x();
00034         int y=e->y();
00035 
00036         //Change tool tip       
00037         QString country = m_gray->country( x, y );
00038         if ( !( country == "EMPTY" ) )  QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), country );
00039         else    QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), "" );
00040         
00041 }

00048 void WorldMap::SunChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00049 {
00050         int width = m_map.width();
00051         int height = m_map.height();
00052          
00053 
00054         
00055         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;  
00056         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00057         
00058         double hourAngle = coordinates.dHourAngle;
00059         int division = (int ) ( ( hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree )/ tgc::TwoPi );
00060         double remainPart = (hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree ) - ( division * tgc::TwoPi );
00061         m_hourAngle = remainPart;
00062         
00063         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00064         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00065         
00066         double sx = cos( m_declination ) * cos( m_hourAngle );
00067         double sy = -cos( m_declination) * sin( m_hourAngle );
00068         double sz = sin( m_declination );
00069 
00070         if ( sz == 0 ) sz = 0.0000000000001;
00071         
00072         m_points.clear();
00073         
00074         for( int x = 0; x < width; x++ )
00075         {
00076                 double lon = ( ( x * tgc::TwoPi ) / width ) - tgc::Pi;
00077                 double lat = atan( - ( sx * cos( lon ) + sy * sin( lon )  ) / sz );
00078                 //double y = ( lat + tgc::Pi/ 2) * height / tgc::Pi;
00079                 double y = ( height/ 2 ) - ( ( lat * ( height/ 2 ) ) / ( tgc::Pi/ 2) ); 
00080                 m_points.append( QPoint( x, y ) );
00081         
00082         }
00083         update();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void WorldMap::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* /*event*/ )
00087 {
00088         QPainter painter( this );
00089         painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::darkGreen, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00090         //painter.setBrush( QBrush( Qt::darkGreen, Qt::SolidPattern ) );
00091         
00092         if( m_points.size() > 0 )
00093         {
00094                         
00095 
00096                 QImage alpha( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00097                 
00098                 QImage copy( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00099                 for( int x = 0; x< m_map.width(); x++ )
00100                 {
00101                         for( int y1 = 0; y1 < m_points[x].y(); y1++ )
00102                         {
00103                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y1 ) );
00104                                 QColor pixelColor;
00105                                 if( m_declination > 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00106                                 else pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00107                                 copy.setPixel( x, y1, pixelColor.rgb() );
00108                         }
00109                         for( int y2 = m_points[x].y(); y2 < m_map.height(); y2++ )
00110                         {
00111                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y2 ) );
00112                                 QColor pixelColor;
00113                                 if( m_declination < 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00114                                 else    pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00115                                 copy.setPixel( x, y2, pixelColor.rgb() );
00116                         }
00117                         
00118                 }
00119                 
00120                 painter.drawImage(0, 0, copy );
00121         
00122                 QVector< QPoint > points;
00123                 points.append( m_points[0] );
00124                 for( int index = 0; index < m_points.size()-1; index++ )
00125                 {
00126                         points.append( m_points[index] );
00127                         points.append( m_points[index] );
00128                 }
00129                 points.append( m_points[m_points.size()-1] );
00130                 painter.drawLines( points );
00131                 
00132                 double x =      ( ( -m_hourAngle + tgc::Pi) * m_map.width() ) / tgc::TwoPi;
00133                 if( x < 0 )     x = m_map.width() + x;
00134                 double y =      (m_map.height()/ 2) + ( (-m_declination   * ( m_map.height()/ 2 ) )  / ( tgc::Pi / 2 ) );
00135                 painter.drawImage( x, y, m_sun );
00136                 
00137                 //Draw Text
00138                 painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::black, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00139                 painter.setFont( QFont( "MS Shell Dlg 2", 8 ) );
00140                 QString azimuth = QString("Azimuth: %1").arg( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00141                 painter.drawText ( 20, 280, azimuth );
00142                 QString zenith = QString("Zenith: %1").arg( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00143                 painter.drawText ( 20, 310, zenith );
00144                 QString ascension = QString("Right Ascension: %1").arg( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00145                 painter.drawText ( 20, 340, ascension );
00146                 QString declination = QString("Declination: %1").arg( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00147                 painter.drawText ( 20, 370, declination );
00148          }
00149          else   painter.drawImage(0, 0, m_map);
00150          
00151         
00152  }
